name: sussex
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area of southeastern England that used to be a county (= area with its own local government). In 1974 it was divided into the counties of East Sussex and West Sussex: According to the Met Office records, the sunniest place in Britain is Bognor, in Sussex.
More examplesFewer examplesThis international conference will be held at Cobden's home, Dunford House in Sussex. In Sussex, increasing numbers of English vineyard owners are putting their faith in a warm future.His cricketing career includes playing for Sussex.He settled on the Sussex coast, at Offington.
